 * Processor: PIC16F877A
 * Compiler:  CCS for PIC

#include <16F877A.h>
#fuses NOWDT, HS, NOPUT	, NOPROTECT , NODEBUG , NOBROWNOUT , NOLVP 
#use delay(clock=8M)
int j,i,k;	
char led=8;
 char x=1;
 
char y=255; 
int dem=0;
 int sangdan,tatdan;
 int bai17;
 
void main (void){
   // Write your code here
   
  // char Led[13]={0xfd,0x60,0xDA,0xf2,0x66,0xB6,0xBE,0xE0,0xfE,0xf6};
 // char Led_1234[5]={0x60,0xdb,0xf2,0x66}; //12.34
    char Led_stop[5]={0xb6,0x0e,0xfC,0xCE}; //Stop
   char Led_star[5]={0xb6,0x0e,0xEE,0x8C}; 	//Star
   char leddich[5]={0x07,0x0B,0x0D,0x0E};
   //Output_low(PIN_D3);
   
      while(dem <=31){
	 
      for (int k=0;k<230;k++){
      for(j=0;j<5;j++)
	 {
	  Output_d(leddich[j]);
   	    delay_ms(0.8);
   	    Output_b(Led_star[j]);
   	    delay_ms(0.8);
   	    Output_b(0);
   	    delay_ms(0.8);
	 } 
	 }
	 dem++;}
      
	 dem=0;
    while(dem <=31){
	 
      for (int k=0;k<230;k++){
   	  for(i=0;i<5;i++){
	 
      Output_d(leddich[i]);
	delay_ms(0.8);
   Output_b(Led_stop[i]);
   delay_ms(0.8);
   Output_b(0);
   delay_ms(0.8);
	  }}dem++;}
	       dem=0;
       }     
      
      
      
      
      
      
     /* for(j=0;j<14;j++)    //Chay tu 0 den 9
      {
   Output_d(0x07);
   Output_b(Led[j]);
   delay_ms(100);
   Output_b(0);
   delay_ms(100);*/

      for(sangdan=0;sangdan<2;sangdan++)

      while(dem <= 8)
      {
	 Output_c(x);
	 delay_ms(10);
	 Output_c(0x00);
	 delay_ms(10);
	 j=x<<1;
	 x=j+1;
	 dem++;
      }
	 x=1;
	 dem=1;
   } 
      for(tatdan=0;tatdan<257;tatdan++)
   {
      while(dem <= 8)
      {
	 Output_c(y);
	 delay_ms(100);
	 Output_c(0x00);
	 delay_ms(100);
	 j=y>>1;
	 y=j;
	 dem++;
      }
	 y=255;
	 dem=1;
   }
